title: Accenture lists top 5 tech trends for 2022 - VentureBeat
content: Accenture lists top 5 tech trends for 2022  VentureBeat
description: Did you miss a session at the Data Summit? Watch On-Demand Here. Over the last few months, the term metaverse has catapulted from relative obscurity to a buzzword in the tech realm.
